from datetime import date, timedelta

def days_until_christmas(day):
    next = day + timedelta(days=6) # Increments year if between christmas and new years
    return (date(next.year,12,25) - day).days

def days_until_christmas(dt):

  is_after = int(dt.month==12 and dt.day>25)
  christmas = dt.replace(month=12, day=25, year = dt.year + is_after)

  return (christmas - dt).days

def days_until_christmas(day):
    return (date(day.year + (1 if day.month > 11 and day.day > 25 else 0), 12, 25) - day).days

import datetime
def days_until_christmas(year):
   
    k=year.year
    
    dc=datetime.date(k,12,25)
    r=dc-year
    
    ret=r.days
    
    if ret>=0:
        return ret
    else:
        dc=datetime.date(k+1,12,25)
        r=dc-year
       
        ret=r.days
        
        return ret

import datetime

def days_until_christmas(today):
    noel = datetime.date(today.year, 12, 25)
    result = (noel-today).days
    return result if result >= 0 else (datetime.date(noel.year+1,noel.month,noel.day)-today).days

from datetime import date

def days_until_christmas(day):
    this_christmas = date(day.year, 12, 25)
    next_christmas = date(day.year + 1, 12, 25)
    return (this_christmas - day if day <= this_christmas else next_christmas - day).days
